page.title: 10SAM BURT
page.content: SAM BURT AGED 79, HAS LIVED IN TREGONY ALL HIS LIFE. HE SAID THAT THE SIZE OF TREGONY HAS INCREASED BECAUSE A LOT OF ESTATES HAVE BEEN BUILT, THE CAUSE OF THIS IS MORE PEOPLE MOVING INTO TREGONY. SAM WAS A MASON AND HE NOW LOOKS AFTER THE VILLAGE HALL. HE SHOPS IN TREGONY,TRURO OR ST AUSTELL SOME SHOPS IN TREGONY NO LONGER EXIST. HE USES THE LOCAL BUS SERVICE. IN HIS TIME MANY SCHOOLS HAVE CLOSED AND THEY HAVE BEEN REPLACED BY THE ROSELAND SCHOOL.HE USED TO TAKE PART IN PANTOMINES,KEEP FIT,BAND PRACTISE AND DOG TRAINING. DAYS HE HAS CELEBRATED ARE THE JAPANESE SURRENDER, THE QUEENS MARRIAGE AND OTHER ROYAL EVENTS.THE MAIN FARMING CHANGE IS THAT THERE IS LESS LABOUR DUE TO NEW MACHINES.
